welcome_message_body: Welcome to Semarang, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Semarang has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut is a pizzeria located in Semarang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Pandanaran No. 115 (Jl.Pemuda), Semarang, Jawa Tengah 50243

restaurants.name: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut Pak Supar
restaurants.description: Ayam Goreng & Sop Buntut Pak Supar is a asian restaurant located in Semarang.
restaurants.address: Jalan Mohammad Husni Thamrin, Semarang, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Bowery Bar & Resto
restaurants.description: Bowery Bar & Resto is a steakhouse located in Semarang.
restaurants.address: Jalan A Yani No 140, Semarang, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Simpang Lima Food Festival
restaurants.description: Simpang Lima Food Festival is a indonesian restaurant located in Semarang.
restaurants.address: Jl Simpang D, Semarang, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: The Naked Crab - SEMARANG
restaurants.description: The Naked Crab - SEMARANG is a seafood restaurant located in Semarang.
restaurants.address: Jalan Melati Selatan No. 22 (Sebelah Depot Sukses, Gajahmada) (Gajahmada), Semarang, Jawa Tengah
